idea:
CLEAN CLOTHES ACHIEVE DREAMS & HOPES.
We are a work from home eco-friendly safe hygienic clothing maintenance dry cleaners/steam press service located in Tardeo Mumbai central India.We provide good quality, economical, professional services to various residents around us mainly senior citizens,students,differently-abled,family,fashion-clothing outlets-professionals,celebrities,government employees,low income group with home pickup&delivery. We are a cost effective startup with the vision of supporting the weaker section of the society. We look forward to serving you and maintaining a healthy relationship. Our mission is to eradicate poverty by helping abandoned & low income group children with hygiene support for a beautiful future.
name: AUM home services

idea:
Mission/Vision Statement

Owing to fragmented nature of the hyper-local services market and lack of transparency regarding price and quality of services offered, Smartfind.in aims to organize it using mobile application based technology. It has set out to solve a major pain point faced by Institutional (B2B) and individual (B2C) consumers through standardized, reliable and instant on-demand services. We want to be the reliable one stop shop for whole bouquet/range of on-demand services across verticals e.g. Wellness, emergency, everyday home services, beauty, education, events etc.

USP

Smartfind.in enables customer to engage service professionals as easily as hailing a cab or buying products online:

Services – Choose from a wide variety of everyday services.

Marketplace - Service providers offer standard prices as well as flexible prices.

Available – Customer can place a request and service providers are able to accept service request 24hrs.

Real-time – End to end tracking & monitoring service request throughout its entire life-cycle.

Take Informed decision - Take an informed decision based on ratings, reviews and price comparison.

How our solution is different from existing solutions in market? 

Most solutions in the market only capture and share customer leads with service providers or vice versa, multiplying the problem rather than solving it. We provide an easy and effective way to define need, compare, choose, engage and track service request till completion.

Impact of our solution in terms of:

Savings for customers:

Transparent pricing based on defined scope of work.

Convenience:

Online booking in real time based on customer's schedule.

Lowering environmental impact:

No paper work as booking, acceptance and tracking of service request are processed online.

Social benefits:

Our platform boosts overall employment situation which is not restricted to white collar jobs only but also local businesses and home based service providers to present their skills online.

Market drivers:

Increasing urbanization, busier lifestyle, Smartphone penetration and growing m-commerce enables consumers to access on-demand services on the go. It provides an opportunity to platforms like ours to grow rapidly.

Scalability:

1. Cloud based platform (e-marketplace for services) which can be implemented in any part of the world without significant changes.

2. Being a marketplace, we on-board existing local service providers, this in turn enables us to launch services in any city within short TAT.

3. Service providers and customers communicate in real-time reducing need for extensive customer care teams and related HR resources.
name: Smartfind.in
